name: Hot Spot
description:
This game was made for the game jam "Shacknews Jam V: The Final Frontier" with the theme “Before the NES/FamiCom”.

My interpretation was to use things invented before the NES/FamiCom which was in 1983.

I made a platformer shooter in which you protect nuclear bombs (Note: Nuclear Bombs Were Invented before 1983) from incoming projectiles using power-ups that are real life things. All power-ups are things invented before 1983.

Have fun trying to survive as long as possible
